title._content: [Unidentified soldier in uniform and Company K hat with musket; Confederate or Union] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in uniform and Company K hat with musket; Confederate or Union] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : ninth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 8.6 x 6.5 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
